dc:title: Day by Day Account of Editor's Travels Thru West and North
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tells of a long bus trip and talks in New York, Chicago, Wisconsin, Minnesota, and Canada. Is impressed with the work of Virgil Michel at St. John's College in Minnesota where he has started a school of social studies--"the theory of the personalist revolution must be studied."
